content.question: In the context of the entire passage, the word “anecdote” (first sentence) is best understood to mean

choices.label: a narrative in the style of a morality play
an informal story involving personal details

content.answer: an informal story involving personal details

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
